Welcome to the team of AirX

At AirX, we are a team of passionate members offering various opportunities by developing employees that deliver consistent quality and services with skills, training support, and making employees successful.

What We Offer

At AirX, we believe in offering a working environment where our employees can flourish professionally and personally. Employees can expect workplace support to succeed in their work along with the appreciation and recognition they deserve. We encourage them to grow consistently.

Benefits to the Employee's

Employee Recognition & Appreciation

Health Benefits

Professional Opportunities

Workplace Support

Fun at work

Jobs

Logistics Operator

Category- Freight operations

Schedule- Full time

Duties and responsibilities:

  • Get new businesses by cold calling.
  • Accountable for all the trackings.
  • Build long-term relations with existing, new customers and co-workers.
  • Resolve issues and queries related to customers.
  • Assist support departments.

Program Manager

Category- Freight operations

Schedule- Full time

Duties and responsibilities:

  • Focus on developing & delivering insights to potential shippers.
  • Collaborate with partners and effectively guide them in data science and engineering to produce product-driven insights.
  • Develop insights to attract high potential customers.
  • Manage day-to-day operations of multiple shipments.
  • Identify at-risk operations and develop contingency plans to minimize the failures.
